summary: Two college students exchange their classes after the college management mixed their identical names by mistake.
cast: Tusshar Kapoor|Emraan Hashmi|Isha Sharvani|Tanushree Dutta|Paresh Rawal|Sushmita Mukherjee|Kabir Sadanand|Anang Desai|Prabha Sinha|Rakesh Bedi|Navni Parihar|Madhura Naik|Harry|Tarun|Joy Sengupta|Nassar Abdulla|Ghanshyam Garg|Palash Dutta|Arunav Chatterjee|Lalit Parashar|Rajesh Balwani|Benazir|Jennifer Mayani|Ajay Thakur|Ambika Chaudhary|Anuj Gill|Punit Aneja|Ajay Dixit|Abhishek Rawat|Tarul Swami
title: Good Boy, Bad Boy
